languages.text: "Вряд ли это было спланированным нападением — слишком оно выглядело... неряшливым, что ли. Однако, может, таков предел интриганства для заштатной планеты".

traits.locale_text: "Особенно надевающие лица чужих братьев. Расследовал я как-то дело одного чучельника-ксенофила — но здесь явно не единичный случай помешательства".

languages.text: "The attack is unlikely to have been planned. It looked too... messy, shall we say. On the other hand, perhaps that's the best this backwater planet can do when it comes to plotting and scheming."
languages.original_text: "Вряд ли это было спланированным нападением — слишком оно выглядело... неряшливым, что ли. Однако, может, таков предел интриганства для заштатной планеты".

traits.locale_text: "The attack is unlikely to have been planned. It looked too... shall we say, messy. But on the other hand, perhaps this backwater planet can do no better when it comes to plotting and scheming."
"The attack is unlikely to have been planned. It looked too... shall we say, messy. But on the other hand, perhaps this backwater planet can do no better when it comes to plotting and scheming."
"The attack is unlikely to have been planned. It looked too... messy, shall we say. On the other hand, perhaps that's the best this backwater planet can do when it comes to plotting and scheming."
"The attack is unlikely to have been planned. It looked too... messy, shall we say. On the other hand, perhaps that's the best this backwater planet can do when it comes to plotting and scheming."
"The attack is unlikely to have been planned. It looked too... messy, shall we say. On the other hand, perhaps that's the best this backwater planet can do when it comes to plotting and scheming."
"The attack is unlikely to have been planned. It looked too... messy, shall we say. On the other hand, perhaps that's the best this backwater planet can do when it comes to plotting and scheming."

languages.text: "Der Angriff war vermutlich nicht geplant. Er sah zu ... chaotisch aus, sage ich mal. Andererseits hat dieser hinterwäldlerische Planet vielleicht nichts Besseres zu bieten, wenn es um Intrigen und Ränke geht."
languages.original_text: "The attack is unlikely to have been planned. It looked too... messy, shall we say. On the other hand, perhaps that's the best this backwater planet can do when it comes to plotting and scheming."

traits.locale_text: "Der Angriff war vermutlich nicht geplant. Er sah zu ... chaotisch aus, sage ich mal. Andererseits hat dieser hinterwäldlerische Planet vielleicht nichts Besseres zu bieten, wenn es um Intrigen und Ränke geht."

languages.text: « Je doute que cette attaque ait été préméditée. Elle m'a paru trop... désorganisée, disons. D'un autre côté, cette planète arriérée est peut-être incapable de fomenter un complot plus efficacement. »
languages.original_text: "The attack is unlikely to have been planned. It looked too... messy, shall we say. On the other hand, perhaps that's the best this backwater planet can do when it comes to plotting and scheming."

traits.locale_text: « Je doute que cette attaque ait été préméditée. Elle m'a paru trop... désorganisée, disons. D'un autre côté, cette planète arriérée est peut-être incapable de fomenter un complot plus efficacement. »

languages.text: 「この襲撃が計画的だったとは考えにくい。あまりにも…雑だったと言えばいいでしょうか。一方で、このような辺境の惑星では、陰謀や策謀といってもこの程度が限界なのかもしれませんね」
languages.original_text: "The attack is unlikely to have been planned. It looked too... messy, shall we say. On the other hand, perhaps that's the best this backwater planet can do when it comes to plotting and scheming."

traits.locale_text: 「この襲撃が計画的だったとは考えにくい。あまりにも…雑だったと言えばいいでしょうか。一方で、このような辺境の惑星では、陰謀や策謀といってもこの程度が限界なのかもしれませんね」

languages.text: «Es poco probable que el ataque fuera premeditado. Estaba demasiado... desorganizado, por así decirlo. Por otra parte, tal vez este mundo no sea capaz de más a la hora de conspirar».
languages.original_text: "The attack is unlikely to have been planned. It looked too... messy, shall we say. On the other hand, perhaps that's the best this backwater planet can do when it comes to plotting and scheming."

traits.locale_text: «Es poco probable que el ataque fuera premeditado. Estaba demasiado... desorganizado, por así decirlo. Por otra parte, tal vez este mundo no sea capaz de más a la hora de conspirar».

languages.text: “那场袭击看起来不太像是事先策划好的，因为实在是……太乱了。但话说回来，这颗行星本身也只是个穷乡僻壤，说不定他们最多也只能策划到这种程度。”
languages.original_text: "The attack is unlikely to have been planned. It looked too... messy, shall we say. On the other hand, perhaps that's the best this backwater planet can do when it comes to plotting and scheming."

traits.locale_text: “那场袭击看起来不太像是事先策划好的，因为实在是……太乱了。但话说回来，这颗行星本身也只是个穷乡僻壤，说不定他们最多也只能策划到这种程度。”

languages.text: "Saldırının planlı olduğunu sanmıyorum. Gelişigüzeldi bile denebilir. Öte yandan bu ücra gezegendekilerin elinden gelen en iyi şey, entrika çevirmek olabilir."
languages.original_text: "The attack is unlikely to have been planned. It looked too... messy, shall we say. On the other hand, perhaps that's the best this backwater planet can do when it comes to plotting and scheming."

traits.locale_text: "Saldırının planlı olduğunu sanmıyorum. Gelişigüzeldi bile denebilir. Öte yandan bu ücra gezegendekilerin elinden en iyi gelen şey entrika çevirmek olabilir."
